applyCode.title: Code laagu karein
applyCode.introduction: Bloom partners ke saath kaam karta hai tak duniya bhar ke survivors ki healing mein sahyog kar sake.
applyCode.description: Yadi aapko hamare kisi partner se access code mila hai toh aap usse add kar sakte hain taki aapko programme specific sahayata mil sake.
applyCode.descriptionLine2: Aap ek se adhik partner ke code jod sakte hain.
applyCode.partnershipsDescription: Hamari partnerships ke bare mein aur jaanne ke liye unke logo par click kariye.
applyCode.formIntroduction: Bloom partner se mila access code daaliye.

formSuccess.success: Appke account par ek Bumble code laga gaya hai!
formSuccess.successLine2: Aapka Bumble access neeche di gai cheezon saksham karta hai:

form.assignPartnerAccessError: Apke account pe code lagane mein error aya hai.  Baad mein dubara prayaas kariye aur <contactLink>Bloom ki team ko meesage kariye</contactLink> agar aapko yeh error dobara aa raha hai.

codeErrors.internal: Aapke access code ko validate karne mein error aa raha hai. Baad mein dubara prayaas kariye aur <contactLink>Bloom ki team ko meesage kariye</contactLink> agar aapko yeh error dobara aa raha hai.
codeErrors.expired: Yeh code expire ho chuka hai. Partner ki team se sampark karein.
codeErrors.invalid: Aapka access code invalid hai. Typos ki jaanch karein ya fir partner se sampark karein.
codeErrors.alreadyInUse: Yeh code pehle se he istemaal ho chuka hai. Agar aapko lagta hai ki koi galti hui hai, toh partner ki team se sampark karein.
codeErrors.alreadyApplied: Yeh code apke account me phele se hi lag chuka hai.

aboutYou.title: Aapke bare mein
aboutYou.description: Yeh sawal humein samjhne mein madad karte hain ki kaun Bloom istemaal kar raha hai aur unhe humse kis tarha ki support chahiye.
aboutYou.descriptionALine1: Abtak aapke uttaron ke liye shukriya!
aboutYou.descriptionALine2: Kyuki aap hamare naye user hain, hum samjhna chahte hain ki hamari sevaon ko istemaal karne se pehle aapn kesa mehsoos kar rahe hain. Hum yeh poochte hain taki hum measure kar sakein ki Bloom ka istemaal karne se survivours par kya asar pad raha hai taki hum sahi cheezo par focus kar paye.

demographicForm.genderLabel: Kripya ek ya ek se adhik option chuniye jis bhi ling se aap pehchaan karte hain.
demographicForm.genderHelpText: Hum yeh aap se pooch rahe hain taki hum behtar samjh sakein ki humare user kis ling se pehchaan karte hain, taki hum zada sahit aur ling-pushti jankaari wale sansadhan bana sakein. Aap “Batana pasand nahi karte” option bhi chun sakte hain.
demographicForm.neurodivergentLabel: Kya aap apne aapko neuro-divergent ke roop mein describe karenge?
demographicForm.neurodivergentHelpText: Hum apni sevaon ko ese design karte hai ko vo sabke liye inclusive ho. Toh humare liye bahut helpful hota hai jab humein neurodivergent logon se feedback milti hai.
demographicForm.raceEthnNatnLabel: Aapki race, ethnicity and nationality kya hai? E.g., White Hispanic Mexican, or Tamil Indian.
demographicForm.raceEthnNatnHelpText: Hum jaante hain ki sab logon ka unki race aur ethnicity ke sath experience alag hota hai jo depend karta hai ki vo kahan rehte hain. Toh aap vo likhiye jo sabse achi tarha se aapko describe karta hai.
demographicForm.countryLabel: Aap kaunse desh mein abhi reh rahe hain?
demographicForm.countryHelpText: Yeh samjhne mein humein madad karega ki survivors services kahan se le rahe hain

baseForm.scaleDescriptionLine1: apni sehmati ke anusaar neeche likhe hue statements ko rate karein:
baseForm.scaleDescriptionLine2: 1 = Poori tarha asehmat, 10 = Poori tarha sehmat

scaleLabels.Q1: Mein samjhti hu ki jo trauma mene experience kiya hai usne kese mere dimaag, shareen aur feelings ko affect kiya hai
scaleLabels.Q2: Mujhe pata hai ki kuch coping mechanisms mujhe long term mein help nahi karte, par yeh bhi pata hai un coping mechanisms ki taraf akarshit hona ek normal trauma response hai
scaleLabels.Q3: Mujhe pata hai ki heal karne ke liye waqt, energy aur sabar chahiye hota hain
scaleLabels.Q4: Mein apne aapko vo poora dhyaan doongi jo mujhe theek hone aur heal hone ke liye chahiye.
scaleLabels.Q5: Mujhe pata hai ki mujhe kya cheezein karna pasand hai aur mein unhe karne ke liye apne routine mein se time nikaalti hu
scaleLabels.Q6: Mein samajhti hu ki trauma se heal hone ka ek hissa hai apne triggers ke saath deal karna
scaleLabels.Q7: Mein samajhti hu ki jo cheezein mujhe surakshit ya asurakshit mehsoos karati hai vo mere liye unique hai
scaleLabels.Q8: Mein pehle he samjh jati hoon jab mere triggering moments, jagahein ya waqt aasakte ho aur unke saath cope karparti hoon.

setAForm.hopesLabel: Esi kya ek cheez hai jo aap asha karte ho ki Bloom apko samjhne ya karne mein madad karega?

disableServiceEmails.title: Bloom ke emails band kar diye gaye!
disableServiceEmails.description: Ab aapko Bloom se judde koi emails nahi milenge. Agar aap isse baad mein badalna chahte hain, toh <link>please Bloom ki team se contact karein.</link>
disableServiceEmails.error: Bloom ke emails band karne mein dikkat hui hai. Please page refresh karke phir try karein, ya <link>Bloom ki team se contact karein.</link>

accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.description: Aapke settings ko dekhiye aur update kijiye
accountSettings.imageAlt: Sandesh yukta mobile phone ka chitraan jis mein dil hai

profileSettings.title: Profile details
profileSettings.description: Yahaan apana naam aur eemel apadet karen. yah aapakee profail mein sangraheet ekamaatr vyaktigat jaanakaaree hai.
profileSettings.emailAlreadyInUseError: Yah eemel pahale se hee kisee any khaate dvaara upayog mein hai, krpaya punah prayaas karen
profileSettings.confirmDialogTitle: jab aap apana eemel badalate hain, to aapako phir se log in karana hoga. kya aap aage badhana chaahate hain?

accountSettings.updateError: aapka Bloom ke account update krne mein dikkat hui hai. Please page refresh karke phir try karein, ya <link>Bloom ki team se contact karein.</link>

actions.title: Account Actions
actions.description: Aapka account delete karne se aapka naam, email address aur dekhe gaye sessions ka history permanently delete ho jayega.
actions.resetPasswordConfirmDialogTitle: jab aap apana password update karenge, to aapako phir se log in karana hoga. kya aap aage badhana chaahate hain?
actions.deleteAccountConfirmDialogTitle: kya aap sach mein apana account delete karna chaahate hain?
actions.deleteAccountConfirmDialogDescription: yah aapake naam, eemel pata aur dekhe gaye sessions ka history hamesha ke liye delete kar dega.

emailSettings.title: Email Preferences
emailSettings.description: Humein bataein ki kya hum aapko email bhej sakte hain:
emailSettings.serviceEmailsPermissionLabel: Bloom ko meri account ke changes aur feedback ke baare mein emails bhejne de
emailSettings.contactPermissionLabel: Bloom ko naye course, bhasha ya service available hone par mujhe emails bhejne de
emailSettings.updateError: aapka Bloom ke account update krne mein dikkat hui hai. Please page refresh karke phir try karein, ya <link>Bloom ki team se contact karein.</link>

emailRemindersSettings.title: Email Reminders
emailRemindersSettings.introduction: Trauma se guzarna mushkil ho sakta hai, khासकर yedi aap ise akela kar rahe hain.
emailRemindersSettings.description: Hum aapki upchar yaatra mein shirsha par रहने mein aapki madad kar sakte hain, agar aap thodi der ke liye sign in nahi karte hain to saumya anusmarak ke saath.
emailRemindersSettings.update: Aap is setting ko kabhi bhi update kar sakte hain
emailRemindersSettings.updateError: Aapki email reminders settings ko update karne mein koi error hui. Is page ko refresh karke punah try karen, ya <link>Bloom team se संपर्क करें।</link>
